song.englishname: Fault Line a Fault of Mine

english.segment1: I'm not scared that this is happening, I'm not afraid but this is real, this is real. I'll count the ways, from every single direction. This time I'm not, I'm not sleeping alone
english.segment2: How could this be real. I've failed you, i've failed you
english.segment3: I was lying when i said, i was looking up. I was too scared to show what i am. Bare with me, bare with me, this is all I have left. This might be more than a simple conversation
english.segment4: Its been dancing around my head. For quite some time. Just a thought of cleaning up myself
english.segment5: I was lying when i said, i was looking up. I was too scared to show what i am. Bare with me, bare with me, this was all i had left. This might be more than a simple conversation
english.segment6: I'm not sleeping. I'm not sleeping at all, I stare at the wall, watching my time float away. Its all been a blur, and nothing will change. I stare at the wall, watching my time float away. Its all been a blur, and nothing will change. I was lying (I WAS LYING) I was lying (I WAS LYING). This is defeat.
